Refreshing & sophisticated three story 4 bed 2 bath home situated blocks from the heart beat of Temple U…and it’s just the quality product you’ve been waiting for! The kitchen space finely features granite countertops, a double door refrigerator, microwave and electric stove among oak cabinetry, as well as enough room for a table and chairs and then some. This home needs to be viewed to appreciate all of the great features it has to offer

description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: True 3br; 2.5 ba Townhouse
description:
819 Bainbridge is a true three bedroom, 2.5 bathroom single family home. The kitchen was re-done in 2015, and you will find a natural gas grill on the back patio. The first floor has a powder room and coat closet to compliment the living and dining spaces. There are hardwood floors throughout the home.
On the second floor you find two equally sized bedrooms, with sizable closets, sharing a full bathroom. The third floor has the master suite: bedroom, walk in closet, full bathroom, linen closet, and 3rd floor north facing private balcony. The unfinished basement houses large, top loading, washer and drier. There is ample storage space in the basement, which has also been previously utilized as an exercise room. Central air supplies both the heating and air conditioning to the home.
This house is conveniently located in Bella Vista, and is within the coveted William M. Meredith School catch-man area. This home is a short walk from Whole Foods (2 Blocks, 3 minute walk), ACME (3 blocks, 5 minute walk) and the Italian Market (5 blocks, 6 minute walk).
Also conveniently accessible are delicious and highly regarded restaurants and bars, which are too many to list (inquire for suggestions regardless of intention to rent!), as well as coffees shops. The house is a 10 minute walk to the Broad Street Subway (BSL) and Path to NJ. This home rests between two wonderful parks, Palumbo Recreation Center to the west, and Cianfrani Park to the east. Center City East and West are also readily accessible on foot, and University City/ West Philadelphia are easily accessed by bus (40), bike or car. There are numerous preschools and learning centers available in the community to support young children.
This home is perfect for a family or young professionals.
Please don't hesitate to reach out. If you are interested in this home, I hope to hear from you!

title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Wood Floors, Package Room
description:
The studio apartment home at 610 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. This home on the 6th floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as June 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Indulge in a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage

description: Poplar St,  Welcome home to 510 Poplar Street! Your next home is a perfect mix of price, condition, and location. Located in the heart of Northern Liberties is this brick front, 4-bedroom, 3 full bathroom home that has been professionally renovated from top to bottom, inside and out, with no expense spared.  The approach to your home is outlined by a new driveway, walkway, and planter bed. The new roof, iron rails and black exterior windows provide a crisp contrast to the classic brick façade. As you step inside you are immersed in natural daylight and an open concept plan that leads your eyes straight through the kitchen to the first exterior patio space! This main level features new windows, recessed lighting, and hardwood floors throughout. The kitchen doesn’t miss a beat providing contemporary white shaker cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, subway tile backsplash and gorgeous quartz countertops. An abundance of cabinetry and center island provide endless storage possibilities. There is a new deck right off the kitchen with enough space to entertain and grill or just take in the mornings with a fresh cup of coffee! As you head upstairs you will notice the consistent flow of the hardwoods, a hall bath featuring rippled, white subway tile and black fixtures. There are two generous sized bedrooms with recessed lighting on this floor and then the primary suite boasting two closets, recessed lighting, and a spa-like ensuite with walk in shower completed with a gray marble like tile on floors and walls with a natural stone shower base and black fixtures. As if all of this was not enough then head downstairs to the finished lower level with access from both the front and rear of the house. This level provides an area for the laundry, a fourth bedroom and yes, a third full bathroom with white marble look tile, natural stone shower base, and black fixtures. The rear of this area provides access to the backyard, shelter from the deck above and a perfect amount of privacy and green space to sit outside and just relax. The opposite side of the lower level provides outside access to the front of the home with a full glass door and sidelights that open to let in a cool summer breeze. Because of the separate entrance, this lower level is a flexible space that can be used as an in-law suite or even the occasional Airbnb providing extra income to your family. This location is a walker’s paradise, with plenty of local shops, cafes,  bars & restaurants. You will be at the heart of it all, while still having easy access to the highway and bridges. This home was renovated by taking the existing structure down to the studs. There are decades of maintenance free living and peace of mind by making this your next home.
